about_the_game:
Meet Paul and his fiancée, Lisa! They have exciting plans for the big day, but things take a turn for the worst. First, there is a suspicious accident in which one of their friends is killed. Then, a Scotland Yard officer recruits Paul as an undercover agent… They become involved in an investigation that will change their relationship forever. I guess many things can go wrong on the road to marriage!

What is certain is that their lives will never be the same...

In this virtual novel, you play the role of the future groom. You will have multiple choices that have impacts on your relation.

Knowing your fiancée decided to go off the pill to show her pregnancy to everyone at the wedding, will you still share your girlfriend with your best friend and/or try to keep her away from your perverted customer? This is your choice!

Lisa will also encounter strange fetishes like pet play and forniphilia (objectifying people).

How deep will the rabbit hole go…

Their wedding ceremony will surely be unlike any other before!

At the moment :

  • The demo version end at day 22, the actual release (v0.95) end at day 74.

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters depicted in the game are over the age of 18.
The game contains content not appropriate for all ages: nudity, sexual acts, Cuckoldry/Netorase, strong language, BDSM and humiliation scenes.

Meet Paul and his fiancée, Lisa! They have exciting plans for the big day, but things take a turn for the worst. First, there is a suspicious accident in which one of their friends is killed. Then, a Scotland Yard officer recruits Paul as an undercover agent… They become involved in an investigation that will change their relationship forever. I guess many things can go wrong on the road to marriage!

What is certain is that their lives will never be the same...

In this virtual novel, you play the role of the future groom. You will have multiple choices that have impacts on your relation.

Knowing your fiancée decided to go off the pill to show her pregnancy to everyone at the wedding, will you still share your girlfriend with your best friend and/or try to keep her away from your perverted customer? This is your choice!

Lisa will also encounter strange fetishes like pet play and forniphilia (objectifying people).

How deep will the rabbit hole go…

Their wedding ceremony will surely be unlike any other before!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750 or better, AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750 or better, AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Lisa Total investigation! Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750 or better, AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Lisa Total investigation Demo is an adult game about corruption. Play as the future husband of Lisa, who was forced into an investigation by a mysterious Scotland Yard officer. How far will you push your fiancée to successfully complete this investigation? Beware of your most perverse desire!
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal
